meaningMnemonic: In a <radical>hole</radical>, you see a <radical>big</radical> monster who wants to <kanji>stab</kanji> you. It <kanji>thrust</kanji>s its big spikes at you menacingly. No <kanji>sudden</kanji> movements now, or you'll fall right in!
readingMnemonic: You fall in the big hole. What did I say about <kanji>sudden</kanji> movements!? It’s <reading>totes</reading> (とつ) going to <kanji>stab</kanji> you for sure. Totes.
